posts.title: New Weather Feature Now Live
posts.excerpt: Click on the time display to see current weather conditions, location, and tide information if you're near the ocean.
posts.content:
We've just launched a new weather feature on the home page!

How to Use It

Simply click or tap on the time display, and you'll see:

  • Current temperature (in both Fahrenheit and Celsius)
  • Weather conditions with icons
  • Your current location
  • Tide information (if you're near the ocean)

Privacy

Your location is only used to fetch weather data and is not stored or shared. The feature uses your browser's geolocation API with your permission.
posts.author: The Ingredients Collective

posts.title: Adding Drink Prices to Local Coffee Shops
posts.excerpt: We're working on a new feature to show drink prices at local coffee shops. This will help users make informed decisions about where to get their coffee.
posts.content:
We're excited to announce that we're working on a new feature for The Ingredients: drink prices at local coffee shops!

What's Coming

Soon, when you search for local coffee roasters, you'll be able to see the prices for popular drinks like lattes, mochas, and vanilla lattes. This will help you compare prices and find the best value.

How It Works

The feature will display prices in an expandable section on each coffee shop card. You'll be able to see prices for common drinks, and even contribute prices if you visit a shop.

Stay tuned for updates!
